article_metadata.description:
Gastonia Police are asking for the public’s help to identify a man who stole from Target.
According to police, on January 7 a man walked out of Target in Gastonia without paying for a Bose sound system valued at $500 and an IRobot vacuum valued at $400.
The suspect is described as being about 5-foot 8-inches tall, weighing 160 pounds. He was wearing a gray and white long sleeve shirt, and a gray toboggan hat.
The suspect vehicle is a black SUV, possibly a Kia.
Anyone who can identify
article_metadata.author: Lauren Baheri
